name: Fast Food 64
summary: FAST FOOD 64 is the flagship game of WAVE 1 GAMES. Released in 2017 it was our very first official release for the Atari Jaguar console. This is a spiritual successor to the Atari 2600 game FAST FOOD by Telesys. In this game you take on the role of Mighty Mouth, a disembodied pair of hungry lips who is on a munching binge, You must watch out for the dreaded PURPLE PICKLES because if you accidently eat too many Mighty Mouth will get indigestion and die! This game has 5 differnt game modes including a recreation of the Atari 2600 game. Since it's release the game has gotten a lot of attention and if you're hungry for something a little bizzare check this one out!
